channel.title: Allstarlegends-Oldschool Nostalgia
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0Or4Qx6.gif?1?2113[/img]
Welcome to AllstarLegends,where everything is possible!
AllstarLegends 24/7 Oldschool Nostalgia!
This is a remake of the old Allstarscape in a pi source
Play Now: [url=http://allstarlegends.eu/webclient/]http://allstarlegends.eu/webclient/[/url]
Forum: [url=http://allstarlegends.eu/]http://allstarlegends.eu/[/url]
AllstarLegends FunPk!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ePusK-M3Xmg"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ePusK-M3Xmg[/youtube]
Owner: Boris
I'm looking for good staff! (Dont ask) Also if you find a dupe you get moderator, I dare you!
~FEATURES~
- No Dupes + Cheat engine/cheat clients Blocked - Donor status and donorzone - 21 working skills! - Clan chat + Lootshare - Flower game - Perfect skillcape emotes - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Ingame Highscores - droprates (shows monster drops and rates) - Dedicated server hosting - Slayer with tasks and store - Double EXP Weekends - Regular updates
Minigames
- Castle Wars - Duel arena - Pest Control - Barrows - Tzhaar cave - Barbarian Assoult - Warrior's Guild
Bosses
- Godwars Dungeon - King black dragon - Barrelchest - Kalphite Queen - Dagannoth kings - Chaos Elemental - Giant Mole
